test-case.name: fn-upper-case1args-1
test-case.description: Evaluates The "upper-case" function with the arguments set as follows: $arg = xs:string(lower bound)

test-case.name: fn-upper-case1args-2
test-case.description: Evaluates The "upper-case" function with the arguments set as follows: $arg = xs:string(mid range)

test-case.name: fn-upper-case1args-3
test-case.description: Evaluates The "upper-case" function with the arguments set as follows: $arg = xs:string(upper bound)

test-case.name: fn-upper-case-1
test-case.description: Evaluation of upper-case function as per example 1 (for this function) from the F&O specs.

test-case.name: fn-upper-case-2
test-case.description: Evaluation of upper-case function using the empty sequence Uses the count function to avoid empty file.

test-case.name: fn-upper-case-3
test-case.description: Evaluation of upper-case function that uses only numbers as part of argument Use of count function to avoid empty file.

test-case.name: fn-upper-case-4
test-case.description: Evaluation of upper-case function that uses both numbers and letters as part of argument

test-case.name: fn-upper-case-5
test-case.description: Evaluation of upper-case function that uses only upper case letters as part of argument

test-case.name: fn-upper-case-6
test-case.description: Evaluation of upper-case function that uses only lower case letters as part of argument

test-case.name: fn-upper-case-7
test-case.description: Evaluation of upper-case function that uses both upper and lower case letters as part of argument

test-case.name: fn-upper-case-8
test-case.description: Evaluation of upper-case function that uses the empty string as part of argument Uses "fn:count" to avoid the empty file

test-case.name: fn-upper-case-9
test-case.description: Evaluation of upper-case function that uses the "lower-case" as part of argument

test-case.name: fn-upper-case-10
test-case.description: Evaluation of upper-case function with argument set to "*****"

test-case.name: fn-upper-case-11
test-case.description: Evaluation of upper-case function with argument set to another upper case function

test-case.name: fn-upper-case-12
test-case.description: Evaluation of upper-case function as an argument to the "fn:boolean" function

test-case.name: fn-upper-case-13
test-case.description: Evaluation of upper-case function as an argument to the "fn:concat" function

test-case.name: fn-upper-case-14
test-case.description: Evaluation of upper-case function as an argument to the "fn:not" function

test-case.name: fn-upper-case-15
test-case.description: Evaluation of upper-case function with argument set to "%$#@!"

test-case.name: fn-upper-case-16
test-case.description: Evaluation of upper-case function with argument set to "upper-case"

test-case.name: fn-upper-case-17
test-case.description: Evaluation of upper-case function as part of a boolean expression

test-case.name: fn-upper-case-18
test-case.description: Upper-case of Latin-1 characters

test-case.name: fn-upper-case-19
test-case.description: Upper-case of Greek characters (note: in the case of Saxon, this fails with JDK 6 but succeeds with a later JDK)

modified.change: Related to bug issue #29630 - Added unicode-version

test-case.name: fn-upper-case-20
test-case.description: Upper-case of a title-case character

test-case.name: fn-upper-case-21
test-case.description: Upper-case of LATIN SMALL LETTER SHARP S

test-case.name: fn-upper-case-22
test-case.description: Upper-case of ARMENIAN SMALL LIGATURE MEN XEH

test-case.name: K-UpperCaseFunc-1
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `upper-case()`.

test-case.name: K-UpperCaseFunc-2
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `upper-case("string", "wrong param")`.

test-case.name: K-UpperCaseFunc-3
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `upper-case(()) eq ""`.

test-case.name: K-UpperCaseFunc-4
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `lower-case("ABc!D") eq "abc!d"`.
